current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text: To require a Comptroller General of the United States report assessing a study of the Army on the Combat vehicle industrial base.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

short-title.#text: Army Combat Vehicle Industrial Base Study Validation Act of 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text: Comptroller General of the United States report on assessment of Army study on the combat vehicle industrial base

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall submit to the congressional defense committees a report setting forth an assessment by the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Comptroller General of the United States

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: of the study of the Army on the Bradley Fighting Vehicle industrial base submitted to
pursuant to the Conference Report to Accompany H.R. 4310 (112th Congress), the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2013
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2013
Army Combat Vehicle Industrial Base Study Validation Act/s:2/ss:a

text.#text: address each of the combat vehicles included in the study of the Army;
include an assessment of the reasonableness of the study's methods including, but not limited to the sufficiency, validity, and reliability of the data used to conduct the study; and
include findings and recommendations on the combat vehicle industrial base, but should not replicate the study of the Army.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S1727 IS: Army Combat Vehicle Industrial Base Study Validation Act of 2013
